name: trashily
content:

in a way that involves things of low quality or little value: She is my best friend, but sometimes I think she dresses rather trashily. They adapted the book into a trashily unchallenging television series.
More examplesFewer examplesThe book is not very well written, but it is sometimes trashily enjoyable. Readers of a less trashily populist inclination can have a go at our quiz on classic documentaries.In the trashily decorated room hangs a crystal chandelier.
